summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account associated with Gratitude America, Ltd. It details the account balance at the beginning and end of January 2019, including deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and interest payments.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Account Summary for January 2019
events.description: The document summarizes the account activity for Gratitude America, Ltd. for January 2019, including a beginning balance, deposits, withdrawals, and ending balance.

locations: 34S Park Avenue, NYC20-0102, New York, NY 10154
6100 Red Hook Quarter, D3, St Thomas 00802, United States Virgin Islands
keyFacts: The account balance at the beginning of January 2019 was $314,876.16.
The account had a service charge of $50.00 during the statement period.
An interest payment of $69.87 was credited to the account on January 31, 2019.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors in account statements.
There are no overdraft fees reported for the calendar year.
